abstracts.cdata!:
Part I of the proposed project consists
            of: A. construction or reconstruction of: (i) five sections
            of trunk roads, totalling about 85 miles, (ii) eighteen
            sections of feeder roads, totalling about 288 miles, (iii)
            about 218 miles of roads in Phase II of the agricultural
            road program in the sugar-growing area of
            Miwani-Chemelil-Muhoroni-Koru, and (iv) about 366 miles of
            tertiary roads in settlement area; B. engineering services
            in respect of: (i) detailed engineering of one trunk road
            included in A(i) and two feeder roads included in A(ii),
            (ii) investigation and engineering of required road
            improvements in settlement areas, including those in A(iv),
            (iii) supervision of all works listed under A above, and
            (iv) a study of the organization of the Ministry of Works
            and the implementation of its recommendations.
